Title: Relates to interactive fantasy sports contests; repealer
Summary: Repeals provisions prohibiting the conduct of unregistered interactive fantasy sports contests; provides that interactive fantasy sports contests are not considered a contest of chance constituting a gambling offense under the penal law.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Rpld ยง1412, add ยง1413, RWB L; amd ยง225.00, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law and the penal law, in relation to interactive fantasy sports contests; and to repeal certain provisions of the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law relating thereto
